metadata.Title: CVE-2022-25515 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** stb_truetype.h v1.26 was discovered to contain a heap-buffer-overflow via the function ttULONG() at stb_truetype.h. NOTE: Third party has disputed stating that the source code has also a disclaimer that it should only be used with trusted input.

criterions.comment: libstb package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
